Key Match Events: Dani Olmo scored a goal in the 51st minute
Mikel Merino scored a goal in the 119th minute of extra time
Dani Carvajal received a red card in the 120+6th minute
Post-Match Reflections: Dani Olmo said, 'The heart is always more important than the legs.'

Mikel Merino said, 'There's a lot of work behind it, especially from my teammates, who were doing a great job, and for them to equalise in the 90th minute is a setback, but it's a reward for perseverance and I think we deserve it... We have shown that we know how to suffer, that we have a great team.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was played at a raucous Stuttgart Arena filled by a majority of German fans
Spain were the better side for the first hour and wasted several opportunities
Others: The hosts Germany pushed hard for a late leveller
Spain will face either Portugal or France in the semifinals
